anya-e0105n33:1_0: Aparāpi tisso aṭṭhakathāyo santi khuddakapāṭhaṭṭhakathā dhammapadaṭṭhakathā suttanipātaṭṭhakathā
anya-e0105n33:1_1: cāti, yā tāsu dissamānanigamanavasena ācariyabuddhaghoseneva katāti paññāyanti. Tattha
anya-e0105n33:1_2: pana vuttavacanāni kānici kānici āgamaṭṭhakathāsu vuttākārena na honti. Tasmā eke
anya-e0105n33:1_4: paṭhamaṁ katā, pacchā ācariyena osānasodhanavasena pariyosāpitā vā bhaveyyuṁ, abhidhammaṭṭhakathaṁ
anya-e0105n33:1_5: āyācantena cūḷabuddhaghosena vā katā bhaveyyu’’nti vadanti.
anya-e0105n33:2_0: Taṁ tathā vā hotu aññathā vā, idāni ekantato vinicchinituṁ na sukarameva. Tasmā tāsaṁ
anya-e0105n33:2_1: nigamanavacanavaseneva ettha pakāsayissāma. Tāsu hi dhammapadaṭṭhakathaṁ kumārakassapattherena
anya-e0105n33:2_2: āyācito sirikūṭassa (sirikuḍḍassa) rañño pāsāde viharanto paramparābhataṁ sīhaḷabhāsāya
anya-e0105n33:2_3: saṇṭhitaṁ porāṇaṭṭhakathaṁ pāḷibhāsāya āropetvā vitthāragatañca vacanakkamaṁ samāsetvā
anya-e0105n33:2_4: gāthāsu asaṁvaṇṇitapadabyañjanāni saṁvaṇṇetvā akāsi. Vuttañhi tattha ganthārambhe –
anya-e0105n33:9: Gāthānaṁ byañjanapadaṁ, yaṁ tattha na vibhāvitaṁ;
anya-e0105n33:10: Kevalaṁ taṁ vibhāvetvā, sesaṁ tameva atthato.
anya-e0105n33:14: Pāsāde sirikūṭassa, rañño viharatā mayā’’ti dha. pa. aṭṭha. 2.nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n33:15_0: Ettha ca sirikūṭo nāma samantapāsādikānigamane siripāloti vutto mahānāmoyeva rājāti
anya-e0105n33:15_1: vadanti. Evaṁ sati mahesiyā ānayanaṁ samādāpanamārabbha tena raññā dinne dhūmarakkhapabbatavihāre
anya-e0105n33:15_2: vasantena sā katāti veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṁ mahāvaṁse –
anya-e0105n33:22_0: Tassa pana rañño kāle sā niṭṭhāpitāti na sakkā gahetuṁ. Tassa hi rañño ekavīsatimavasse
anya-e0105n33:22_1: samantapāsādikaṁ niṭṭhāpesi. So ca rājā dvāvīsatimavasse divaṅgato. Etthantare sādhikaekavassena
anya-e0105n33:22_2: ‘‘catasso ca āgamaṭṭhakathāyo tisso ca abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyo ayañca dhammapadaṭṭhakathā’’ti
